INDEX_MAP_EDIT_AVAILABLE_ALL_USER: Edition of a copy available to other users
INDEX_MAP_EDIT_UNAVAILABLE_ALL_USER: Editing a copy unavailable to other users
INDEX_DESCRIPTION:
Histo Atlas is a free software that allows you to draw and visualize historical maps with the visualization of evolution in time of borders, cultural areas or others.
The software allows you to draw areas, add labels, choose a background map, define time zones.
You can register to be able to save your own maps and share them online.
INDEX_CONTACT_LINK_TEXT: Contact me to report a bug, a suggestion, an idea or if you need help.
SERVER_USER_NOT_EXIST: The target user does not exist
SERVER_READ_CONFIG_FAIL: Failed to read the server configuration
SERVER_CONNEXION_DATABASE_FAIL: Unable to connect to the database
SERVER_USER_NAME_NOT_AVAILABLE: The chosen user name is already in use
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Send an email to report a bug, a suggestion or an opinion. You can also ask for assistance to create your maps or request a new feature on the software.
FORGOTPASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your username, you will receive an email to reset your password.
FORGOTPASSWORD_MAIL_SEND: Mail sent to change your password
FORGOTPASSWORD_MAIL_FAIL: Failed to send password recovery email :
FORGOTPASSWORD_MESSAGE_PART1:
Hello 

To reset your password click on the link
FORGOTPASSWORD_MESSAGE_PART2: Your key will be valid for one day
MYPROFIL_PASSWORD_NON_IDENTICAL: The two passwords entered are not identical
MYPROFIL_DELETE_ACCOUNT_VALIDATION: Are you sure you want to delete your account? WARNING: This action is irrevocable!
MYPROFIL_NEWSLETTER_REGISTRATION: You are now registered to the newsletter
MYPROFIL_NEWSLETTER_UNREGISTER: You are now unsubscribed to the newsletter
MYPROFIL_NEWSLETTER_FAIL: Failed to change your newsletter subscription
MYPROFIL_ACCESS_IMPOSSIBLE_NOT_CONNECTED: Unable to access the profile page because you are not logged in
REGISTRATION_DESCRIPTION: Registration is required to save your maps online, but is not required to view the maps.
REGISTRATION_UNABLE_EMPTY_USERNAME: Unable to register : empty user name
REGISTRATION_UNABLE_USERNAME_INVALID: Unable to register: invalid username must contain only letters and numbers
REGISTRATION_UNABLE_MAIL_INVALID: Unable to register : invalid email address
REGISTRATION_UNABLE_PASSWORDS_NO_IDENTIC: The two passwords entered are not identical
RESETPASSWORD_NON_IDENTICAL: The two passwords entered are not identical
SUPPORT_LINE1: To support the project you can share the project, contribute to its source code, create your maps and share them.
SUPPORT_LINE2: If you wish fund the projet, contact me
UNSUBSCRIBENEWLETTER_UNSUBSCRIBE: You have been unsubscribed from the newsletter
MAP_ACTIONS_ACTIVATE_CONTENT_REMOVAL_ALL: Activate content removal on all layers
MAP_ACTIONS_COLOR: Choice of the color of the layer
MAP_ACTIONS_OPACITY: Choice of the opacity of the layer
MAP_ACTIONS_SAVE: Save the map on the server
MAP_ACTIONS_FILL: Filling the area (only works if the area is an unfilled polygon)
MAP_ACTIONS_DESACTIVATE_CONTENT_REMOVAL_: Disable content removal on all layers
MAP_LAYERS_PARENTLAYER_DELETE_VALIDATION: Are you sure you want to remove the layer
MAP_LAYERS_ZONE_DELETE_VALIDATION: Are you sure you want to remove the underlayer
MAP_MARKER_DELETE_VALIDATION: Are you sure you want to remove the marker
MAP_MARKER_LABEL_REQUIRED: Your marker must have a label
MAP_MARKER_END_DATE_INVALID: The end date is not valid
MAP_MARKER_START_DATE_INVALID: The start date is not valid
MAP_SAVEANDLOAD_IMPORTFILE_FORMAT: The imported file must be of JSON type
MAP_SAVEANDLOAD_LOADFILE_INVALID_OR_NOTE: Target map file does not exist or is invalid
MAP_SAVEANDLOAD_SAVE_FILENAME_EMPTY: Save Not Possible : File name is empty
MAP_SAVEANDLOAD_SAVE_FILENAME_INVALID: Save Not Possible : The file name is not valid, it must contain only numbers, letters and spaces
MAP_SAVEANDLOAD_SAVE_IN_PROGRESS: Save in progress, it may take a minutee
MAP_SAVEANDLOAD_FILE_ALREADY_EXIST: The file already exists, do you want to overwrite it
